name: twitter-mentions-regex
content:
// should match `bar`, when opts.dot `bar.baz` 
foo @bar.baz qux

foo @bar_baz qux // should match `bar_baz`
foo @_bar // should match `_bar`
foo @2bar // should match `2bar`

// should match `google`, when opts.dot `google.com`
foo @google.com
foo .@bar

// should not match even when opts.dot
foo @.bar
foo email@google.com
foo git@github.com:tunnckoCore/is-glob

// should not match
foo @bar@baz
foo @!bar
foo @@bar
foo @@bar@baz
foo @@bar!qux
foo @#bar
// more fail cases?

// should match only `bar`
foo @bar baz
foo @bar!baz qux
foo @bar#baz qux
foo @bar$baz qux
foo @bar%baz qux
foo @bar^baz qux
foo @bar&baz qux
foo @bar*baz qux
foo @bar(baz qux
foo @bar)baz qux
foo @bar{baz qux
foo @bar}baz qux
foo @bar<baz qux
foo @bar>baz qux
foo @bar[baz qux
foo @bar]baz qux
foo @bar=baz qux
foo @bar+baz qux
foo @bar-baz qux
foo @bar`baz qux
foo @bar/baz qux
foo @bar\baz qux
foo @bar:baz qux
foo @bar;baz qux
foo @bar?baz qux
foo @bar~baz qux
foo @bar|baz qux
foo @bar"baz qux
foo @bar'baz qux
author: tunnckoCore
